subject: Management
title: Why Conflict Is Inevitable
description: A fast breakdown of Why Conflict Is Inevitable for builders.

hook.text: A team of five brilliant people agreed on everything. Their product was mediocre and derivative.

buildup.text: Zero conflict sounds peaceful. But it usually means nobody cares enough to disagree.

discovery.text: Conflict is friction between different ideas, values, or needs. It's built into teamwork.

twist.text: The goal isn't to eliminate conflict. It's to make it productive instead of destructive.

climax.text: Healthy teams argue about ideas. Unhealthy teams either fight about people or don't argue at all.

punchline.text: No friction, no progress. The question is how you handle it.

quiz.question: Why is some conflict inevitable and even healthy?
options: It drives better ideas when different perspectives collide
Conflict only happens in poorly managed teams
